definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to turn white-hot/to intensify/to reach a climax

sentences.english: After several nuclear disasters, a controversy has raged over the safety of nuclear energy.
sentences.chinese: 几场核灾难过后，一场核能安全的争论到达了白热化。

sentences.english: No city is debating the displacement of residents more heatedly than Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 在芝加哥，关于流离失所的居民的争论正在白热化。

sentences.english: At present, the dispute for saving or abolishing death penalty has achieved the perfervid period.
sentences.chinese: 现在，死刑存废之争已进入了一个白热化的阶段。

sentences.english: In fact, market all quarters rescue the city dispute to tend to the superheating .
sentences.chinese: 事实上，市场各方的救市纷争已趋向白热化。

sentences.english: Home's current and hot SNS market competition pushs Xiang Bai thermalization further.
sentences.chinese: 国内目前火爆的SNS市场竞争进一步推向白热化。

sentences.english: Russia’s political-scandal season has reached a boiling point.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯政治丑闻的一季已经到达白热化阶段。

sentences.english: We’ve all been involved in friendly discussions that turn into heated arguments.
sentences.chinese: 我们都参加过那种变成白热化争论的友好讨论。

sentences.english: This debate came to a head just before the Battle of Fondor.
sentences.chinese: 在方多战役前夕，这场争论达到了白热化的阶段。

sentences.english: Soon pundits and politicians were demagoguing the issue into common currency.
sentences.chinese: 不久专家和政客将此谣言炒至白热化。

sentences.english: Since then, the building materials market in Beijing's white-hot stage to enter the competition.
sentences.chinese: 自那时以来，建材市场在北京的白热化阶段进入竞争。

sentences.english: There is no doubt that Mongolia is white-hot in multinational-investment circles.
sentences.chinese: 毋庸置疑，蒙古在跨国投资界处于白热化的位置。

definition: to turn white-hot/to intensify/to reach a climax
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
to gush/to squirt/to surge/to well out/to overflow
